5#include <iostream>
6
7#include <libdecklink/device.hpp>
8#include <libdecklink/capture_callback.hpp>
9
10#include "handle_errors.hpp"
11
12using namespace DeckLink;
13
14void show_help() {
15 std::cout << "deckquery device-name\n"
16 << "\n"
17 << "Query the specified BlackMagic DeckLink video capture card for the specified attribute.\n"
18 << "\n"
19 << "USAGE:\n"
20 << " --list List the connected devices\n"
21 << " --input-video-modes List the video modes supported on the input\n"
22 << " --output-video-modes List the video modes supported on the output\n"
23 << " --list-attributes List all the device attributes known to this program\n"
24 << " --query-attribute Query the device for a specific AttributeID\n"
25 << " --query-all-attributes Query the device for all known AttributeIDs\n"
26 << "\n"
27 << "QUERY FORMAT:\n"
28 << ""
29 << "\n";
30}
31
32
33std::string get_attribute(DeckLink::Device& device, const AttributeID attribute) {
34 std::ostringstream oss;
35
36 try {
37 switch (AttributeID_::get_value_type(attribute)) {
38 case AttributeType::Flag: {
39 const auto result = device.get_bool_attribute(attribute);
40 oss << (result ? std::to_string(*result) : "");
41 break;
42 }
43
44 case AttributeType::Int: {
45 const auto result = device.get_int_attribute(attribute);
46 oss << (result ? std::to_string(*result) : "");
47 break;
48 }
49
50 case AttributeType::Float: {
51 const auto result = device.get_float_attribute(attribute);
52 oss << (result ? std::to_string(*result) : "");
53 break;
54 }
55
56 case AttributeType::String: {
57 const auto result = device.get_string_attribute(attribute);
58 oss << (result ? *result : "");
59 break;
60 }
61 }
62 }
63 catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error& err) {
64 // The driver will sometimes return errors for perfectly valid attributes.
65 // It's ugly but we're going to swallow them and pretend that everything is fine
66 return "";
67 }
68
69 return oss.str();
70}
71
72
73int main(int argc, char **argv) {
74 // We need at least one option
75 if (argc < 2) {
76 show_help();
77 return -1;
78 }
79
80 try {
81 std::string device_name{argv[1]};
82 if ((device_name == "--list") or (device_name == "-l")) {
83 const auto devices = DeckLink::Device::List();
84
85 std::cout << "Listing detected devices:\n";
86 for (const auto &device: devices) {
87 std::cout << " - " << device.get_display_name()
88 << " ( " << device.get_vendor_name()
89 << " " << device.get_model_name() << " )\n";
90 }
91 return 0;
92 }
93 auto has_device = DeckLink::Device::Get(device_name);
94
95 if (!has_device) {
96 std::cerr << "Error: Unable to locate device named: " << device_name << ".\n";
97 return -1;
98 }
99 auto& device = *has_device;
100
101 // Here we need at least 3 options
102 if (argc < 3) {
103 show_help();
104 return -1;
105 }
106 std::string command{argv[2]};
107
108 const int display_name_len = 19;
109 const int px_fmt_len = 13;
110
111 if (command == "--input-video-modes") {
112
113 std::cout << "Supported input display modes for " << device.get_long_name() << ":\n\n"
114 << " Image Formats | Pixel Formats \n";
115 for (const auto &display_mode: device.input().get_all_supported_display_modes()) {
116
117 std::string display_mode_str = display_mode.get_name();
118 if (display_mode.has_3D_support())
119 display_mode_str += " (+3D)";
120
121 std::cout << std::setw(display_name_len) << std::right
122 << display_mode_str << " | ";
123
124 for (const auto px_fmt: PixelFormat_::Values) {
125 if (px_fmt == PixelFormat::Unknown) continue;
126
127 const auto image_format = display_mode.get_image_format();
128 const bool supported = device.input().supports_pixel_format(image_format, px_fmt);
129
130 if (supported) {
131 const std::string px_fmt_str = PixelFormat_::pretty_print(px_fmt);
132 std::cout << std::setw(px_fmt_len) << px_fmt_str << " ";
133 } else {
134 std::cout << std::setw(px_fmt_len) << std::internal << " ---- " << " ";
135 }
136 }
137 std::cout << "\n";
138 }
139
140 return 0;
141
142 } else if (command == "--output-video-modes") {
143 std::cout << "Supported output display modes for " << device.get_long_name() << ":\n\n"
144 << " Image Formats | Pixel Formats \n";
145 for (const auto &display_mode: device.output().get_all_supported_display_modes()) {
146 std::cout << std::setw(display_name_len) << std::right
147 << display_mode.get_name() << " | ";
148 for (const auto px_fmt: DeckLink::PixelFormat_::Values) {
149 if (px_fmt == PixelFormat::Unknown) continue;
150
151 const auto supported = device.output().get_display_mode_support(display_mode, px_fmt, VideoOutputFlags::Default);
152
153 const std::string px_fmt_str = PixelFormat_::pretty_print(px_fmt);
154 switch (supported) {
155 case DisplayModeSupport::NotSupported:
156 std::cout << std::setw(px_fmt_len) << std::internal << " ---- " << " ";
157 break;
158
159 case DisplayModeSupport::Supported:
160 std::cout << std::setw(px_fmt_len) << px_fmt_str << " ";
161 break;
162
163 case DisplayModeSupport::SupportedWithConversion:
164 std::cout << std::setw(px_fmt_len) << px_fmt_str << "* ";
165 break;
166 }
167 }
168 std::cout << "\n";
169 }
170
171 std::cout << " * Indicates that the display mode is only supported with conversion.";
172
173 return 0;
174
175 } else if (command == "--list-attributes") {
176 std::cout << "List of known attributes: \n";
177 for (const auto attribute: AttributeID_::Values) {
178 std::cout << " - " << to_string(attribute)
179 << " (" << to_string(AttributeID_::get_value_type(attribute))
180 << "): " << AttributeID_::get_explanation(attribute) << "\n";
181 }
182
183 return 0;
184
185 } else if (command == "--query-attribute") {
186 if (argc < 4) {
187 std::cerr << "Error: Attribute name not specified\n\n";
188 show_help();
189 exit(-1);
190 }
191
192 const auto attribute = DeckLink::to_AttributeID(argv[3]);
193 std::cout << "[" << device.get_long_name() << "] :: "
194 << to_string(attribute) << " = " << get_attribute(device, attribute) << "\n";
195
196 return 0;
197 } else if (command == "--query-all-attributes") {
198 for (const auto attribute: AttributeID_::Values) {
199 std::string attribute_value = get_attribute(device, attribute);
200
201 // If the attribute is empty something failed indicating that the attribute is not
202 // supported on this device
203 if (!attribute_value.empty()) {
204 std::cout << "[" << device.get_long_name() << "] :: "
205 << to_string(attribute) << " = " << attribute_value << "\n";
206 }
207 std::cout << "\n";
208 }
209
210 return 0;
211 }
212
213 std::cerr << "\nUnknown command: " << argv[2] << "\n";
214 show_help();
215
216 } catch (const DeckLink::decklink_driver_error& ex) {
217 print_driver_error_details(ex);
218
219 } catch (const DeckLink::runtime_error& ex) {
220 std::cout << "\n"
221 << "An error occurred! \n"
222 << boost::diagnostic_information(ex) << "\n";
223 }
224
225 return -1;
226}
